about_the_game:
The Mountaineers is a climbing platformer. It’s a small arcade game with the objective to climb as high as possible despite various obstacles. You can progress and get rid of the rental shoes, earn your way to go topless and play as different vibrant characters. The game features a wholesome world with a relaxing, yet somewhat competitive atmosphere.

The Sky Is NOT The Limit

  • Climb to infinity and go beyond the borders of earth.
  • Achieve better equipment and upgrade your gear.
  • Every time you play it's a new experience.

You can progress and get rid of the rental shoes, earn your way to go topless and play as different vibrant characters. The game features a wholesome world with a relaxing, yet somewhat competitive atmosphere.

The Sky Is NOT The Limit

name: The Mountaineers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Inten I5
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is great for this game.

short_description: The Mountaineers is a climbing platformer set in a wholesome universe. It’s an arcade game with the objective to climb as high as possible despite various obstacles. As you progress you can get rid of your rental shoes, earn your way to go shirtless and buy proper equipment.
supported_languages: English, Danish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
